Name: Crazy shark
About the game: You have to control a crazed shark that lives in the depths of the ocean. Declare war on all living things, but be careful, the military is hunting you! Eat vacationers, break yachts, wreck ships, destroying submarines and helicopters! Will it be easy? It is unlikely that the armies of the military in helicopters and cars will do everything possible to stop you! Use not only shark teeth, but also a machine gun or a grenade launcher! Kill, destroy and earn points, try to set a record. Good luck in battle!
